selectedVerses.text: For behold, I begin to work disaster at the city that is called by my name, and shall you go unpunished? You shall not go unpunished, for I am summoning a sword against all the inhabitants of the earth, declares the LORD of hosts.'
Much in every way. To begin with, the Jews were entrusted with the oracles of God.
"You shall count seven weeks. Begin to count the seven weeks from the time the sickle is first put to the standing grain.
and he who invited you both will come and say to you, 'Give your place to this person,' and then you will begin with shame to take the lowest place.
Now when these things begin to take place, straighten up and raise your heads, because your redemption is drawing near."
